"Ran": "Based on your success operating as an ARKS, you have been approved to join the \"Independent Corps\"."
"The Independent Corps is a rapid response unit composed of highly capable ARKS who band together to eliminate powerful enemies in a specific region."
"You can join the Independent Corps operations from any Ryuker Device, or from the World Map."
"Once you have prepared your equipment and recruited allies to fight with you, please join the cleanup operation."
"With that, I wish you good luck."
